Bingo.  Fuse lit.  Crashed is an absolutely breathtaking and stunning conclusion to the Driven Trilogy!  I dont ever write long reviews but for some reason it has been very difficult for me to put into words the emotions that this book instilled in me.  It has been a bag of mixed emotions saying goodbye to Colton and Rylee.  Spiderman.  Batman.  Superman.  Ironman  I had a million theories about where this book would go after the absolutely heartstopping ending of Fueled.  It is a tribute to the authors incredible talent that all of my theories were wrong and Colton and Rylees story took me on an emotional journey that has stayed with me weeks after finishing this book.  I felt every gutwrenching scene every emotional high and low and every triumph right down to my very soul.  There are some absolutely beautiful scenes in Crashed and there are some absolutely soulpunching nailbiting ones too.  Each scene felt essential to the book and I also loved how every character was fully explored in Crashed.  I was on the edge of my seat throughout most of Crashed but yet at the same time I didnt want to say goodbye to Colton and Rylee.  This is a substantial juicy story that is meant to be savored and enjoyed.  And the Epilogue!  Kristy Bromberg has earned a place in my heart previously reserved only for Kristen Ashley and Jodi Ellen Malpas with the fantastic Epilogue in Crashed.  Remember hurting is feeling and feeling is living and isnt it good to be alive?  Coltons painful past is fully explored in Crashed and many questions are answered.  Rylee continues to be one of the strongest heroines around and had me cheering and weeping throughout many parts of the book.  The plot is very inventive and there are several relationships that I hope the author will explore in the future.  Do not miss Crashed.  It is absolute perfection A to motherfucking Z!  ARC provided by the author in return for an honest review.

Shes my motherfing checkered flag.  Easily one of my favorite books this year.  Disclaimer: I am no writer so anything I say here will not be able to do justice to the amazing writing talent of K. Bromberg!  So a few months ago a book called Driven landed in my in box along with a lovely email asking if Cathy and I would be interested in reading the book.  Other obligations interfered until finally over the summer I began reading what turned out to be one of my absolute favorite series ever!  As a matter of fact I started reading Driven yes I know this is the Fueled Blog Tour!  while I was on a family vacation that involved a lot of driving.  Thankfully I have three other drivers in my family because every chance I got I hopped in the back seat with my Kindle and said Oh a twohour drive?  No problem!  Lets go!  Thats how obsessed I was with Colton and Rylee.  I could not get enough of them.  I could not wait to dive into Fueled.  And the author literally grabs your heart right from the very beginning and does.  Not.  Let.  Go.  My heart was pounding out of my chest for most of this book.  And its not just the amazingly steamy sex scenes between Colton and Rylee.  Its the actions of Colton its Rylees reactions its the secondary characters the racing scenes the emotional connection between Rylee and Colton.  Well you get the picture.  My blogging partner Cathy read Fueled after release day and was very skeptical about my ranting and raving about Colton and Rylee.  Well she loved it MORE than Driven and she is almost always disappointed with sequels!  Fueled has inspired a lot of fervor from readers and the author kindly responds to every comment email and Tweet about Colton and Rylee.  She is clearly as passionate about her characters as we are.  We RACE you Kristy!  So theres our little review.  No detailed plot descriptions here because this book should most definitely be read without any spoilers because the story is just wow.  Will you have a book hangover after reading Fueled?  Oh yeah.  But please dont bother the author!  She needs to write CRASHED ASAP!

I bet he fks like he drives  a little reckless pushing all the limits and in it until the very last lap.  Driven absolutely blew me away!  Full review at  http://www.thebookbella.com///...  DrivenK.  Bromberg

/ emotionfilled stars for this beautifully written story!  I absolutely loved this story about Cali a girl whose life is empty closed off and bleak even though outwardly she plays the part of the popular carefree party girl.  Cali devotes her time and energy to torturing Logan planning one elaborate prank after another.  Why does she hate Logan so much?  The author keeps us guessing only revealing that once upon a time Logan was the best friend of Calis brother Ben.  The story kept me turning the pages to find out why Logan allowed Cali to hate him so much and what actually happened to Ben:  Our rivalry is beautiful because it makes us both forget about everything else.  It turns out that Cali and Logan actually have a lot more in common than Cali thought at first.  They both love poetry which plays a very important role in Two Roads.  As much as Calis hateful behavior frustrated me at times I absolutely loved Logan!  He is a gorgeous nerd who allows Cali to vent her emotions and hatred towards him and just does not back down.  Logan sees the real Cali underneath her hateful and mean treatment of him and tries to help her let go of her anger and tries to shows her that her life can have meaning.  He is funny sensitive and caring.  Although he plays along with Calis constant pranks and her relentless hatred of him he realizes what they have together.  Will Cali ever recognize what is right in front of her?  Will Logan let Cali push him away?  Two Roads answers all of these questions in a very emotionally satisfying conclusion.  And trust me Logan has now become of my favorite book boyfriends.  Because you stole my heart Cali he whispers running his hand along my cheeks.  You stole my heart and now you wont let me have yours.  Two Roads is a wonderfullywritten emotionfilled story that shows that no matter how hard you search sometimes love is right in front of you.  Well done L.M.  Augustine!  Looking forward to many more books from this very talented writer.  Favorite quote:  I guess I love The Road Not Taken because its saying that no matter what you always get a choice in life.

Fantastic!  Perfect example of why R.K.Lilley is one of my favorite authors.  Character connection great storyline and offthecharts needacoldshower sex scenes.  Bad ThingsR.K.  Lilley  R.K.  Lilley is one of my favorite writers and boy does she deliver an amazing story in Bad Things!  I could not get enough of Danika and Tristan and I am anxiously awaiting more of their story.  There is no instalove here.  The author takes the time to build a deep friendship between Danika and Tristan but they do have an undeniable chemistry that they cannot ignore.  Danika has a long list of strict rules for relationships and Tristan well lets just say that Tristan falls into the badboy category which Danika is trying to avoid.  Danika is totally honest and open with Tristan.  He is who he is and in his own way is honest with Danika too.  If you have read the Up in the Air series not necessary for this book but an amazing series you know that Bad Things takes place several years before James Cavendish meets Bianca and that Tristan gets clean and sober.  You also know that something very tragic happens between Tristan and Danika.  There are several fantastic plot twists that I did not see coming in Bad Things.  There are also several welldeveloped side characters with great stories.  But Bad Things focuses on the EXPLOSIVE attraction and ohsosteamy sex between Tristan and Danika and the author really knows how to deliver some heartpounding sex scenes!  Writers take note: this is how you write contemporary romance!  Oh I like this one I thought watching his throat work as he swallowed.  A sexy man who liked sarcastic women...   Danika  You feel so good sweetheart.  I swear nothings ever felt better in my whole fucking life.   Tristan  I could not out this book down.  I absolutely loved the characters and I want to know much more about Tristan and Danikas journey.  Bad Things is mustread book by an amazing author.  Enjoy the ride!  Thanks to the author for an advance copy of Bad Things in exchange for an honest review
Review coming soon!

Rock My World is a very sexy entry in the Black Falcon series!  It is a fairly quick and very entertaining read.  The story follows Aubrey and Zach Riffs real name as they return to Aubreys home to meet with her father over a legal matter.  Except that Aubrey hasnt told her parents she was bringing home her tattooed rocker boyfriend!  The awkward situation with Aubreys very conservative parents only adds to Zachs insecurities as he struggles to convince himself that he is good enough for Aubrey.  Much drama and hot sex then ensues in this very steamy novella.  Will Zach and Aubrey let outside influences drive them apart?  Will Aubrey cave in to her conservative parents and leave Zach?  Everything comes to a very satisfying conclusion in this story.  As usual Michelle Valentine really delivers a catchy plot with very memorable characters and some scorching hot scenes.  I love Aubrey and Zach.  Rock My World is a great entry in the Black Falcon series and Im looking forward to reading Trips story next in Rock the Beat!  Rock My WorldMichelle A. Valentine

. stars!!  I absolutely LOVE Emma Chases writing style and Twisted is a delicious treat for fans of Drew and Kate!  This book begins two years after Drew and Kate begin dating and they are living together in New York City.  Their chemistry is still HOT and sizzling of course because this is the Tangled series after all but a very serious misunderstanding occurs which threatens the couples Happily Ever After.  What could be a simple event in the hands of another writer becomes an emotional roller coaster that kept me reading this book almost in one sitting.  There is tons of snappy dialogue and some very funny moments mostly thanks to Kates friend Delores.  There are a lot of great twists and turns in this book and although I thought I would not be hooked on Kates POV I absolutely loved reading her POV.  She is smart witty funny and sensitive.  But I think my my favorite part of the whole book might be the Epilogue which is written in my boyfriends oops I mean DREWs POV.  The wonderful cast of supporting characters makes their appearances in Twisted and I loved each and every one of them.  Twisted is a funny witty intelligent and very sexy book and I cannot wait for Tamed!  He pulls the blanket up over both of us and holds me tight against him.  And it makes me feel precious.  He makes me feel that way.  Always.  Cherished.  Adored.  But to know perfectionto touch it breathe it in every dayand then have it taken away?  Loss is agony.  And every inch of my skin aches with it.  Even when I hated you I loved you.   Drew  ARC provided by the publisher in return for an honest review.

Seriously Skye Warren can pack more feeling and vivid description into a short story than some authors can in  pages.  I immediately connected with the lovely young Erin and the object of her desire Mr.  Blake Morris.  This wonderful short erotic story is a total turnon but is very touching at the same time.  Read it you will absolutely love this sweet and steamy story.  Beauty Touched the BeastSkye Warren
Read this book.  End of.  Full review to follow shortly.This Man ConfessedJodi Ellen Malpas

Sexy hot and absolutely exhilarating!  It is kind of scary to read a book from an author who has given you one of your most beloved book boyfriends ever.  Remington Tate is still my true love but Greyson King has stolen my heart.  I loved everything about Rogue the emotion the story the writing and especially the very dark and beautiful Greyson Zero King.  I couldnt put Rogue down and found myself consumed by Greyson and Melanies story.  The book swept me along for a hot and delicious ride filled with emotion happiness and some trepidation.  Would Melanie tame her guy?  Would Greyson be able to keep his secrets from Melanie without destroying them both?  Melanie has been unlucky at love and falls hard for Greyson.  Hes a ten.  Ive never ever been with a ten.  And the way that he looks at me... Ive seen that look before.  The look that Remington Tate gives Brooke.  That look.  Hes giving it to me and Im dying inside.  Can I die from one look?  And if one look can kill me then what would one touch do?  So Melanie and Greyson have unbelievably hot chemistry but the tension comes from whether their relationship will survive once his true relationship with her is revealed.  Greyson is everything I love about a Katy Evans hero  hes possessive protective hot and very demanding.  I absolutely loved the writing and the story as well as the dual POV.  Rogue is a totally exhilarating sexy ride from one of my very favorite authors and I cant wait to read more from Katy!  With you and me there are no givens.  No rules.  Just what we want.  And I want every inch of you.  I want what youve given no one.  ARC provided by the publisher in return for an honest review.

WOW!!  What a ride!!  Ripped was an unexpected gem from one of my favorite authors ever and I loved it from beginning to end!  Pandora is a feisty strong takenoprisoners heroine who came charging out of the gate at a hundred miles an hour.  From the opening scene of Ripped when she and her best friend are planning a payback to Mackenna to the very end Pandora grabbed my heart and didnt let go.  Pandora has always felt crushed and alone after her first and only love broke her heart.  And then went on to sing about it!  Her life has become focused on getting revenge on the only man she has ever loved left her with not a look back.  Mackenna was her true love before he became a famous rock star and to her horror he wrote a hit song about her!  She has spent years hating him.  When her prank goes wrong to stay out of trouble she must make a deal that involves her going on tour with the band.  Will she be able to come to terms with what Mackenna did to her all those years ago?  Will Mackenna be able to make her understand why he did what he did?  Sex sex and rocknroll.  Mackenna is a sex god and Katy Evans doesnt let you forget it!  Ripped actually has more humor in it than the other books in this series and I loved it!!  And of course lots and lots of heart in this one.  Ripped is classic Katy Evans with a twist!  The heroine is angry and heartbroken but tough as nails.  The hero is sexy as hell possessive and tenacious.  I highlighted so much from this book that Ill just share my favorite quotes here:  Stupid girl attracted to bad boy V card handed over heart broken end of story.  Im not even worried about him.  Im familiar with Pandora and her mistake  letting all kinds of bad shit into the world when she opened the box.  Ive always been at war with my name.  Im angry at it because right away it makes me think I can never really be good.  Im a jinx.  God Im such a bluffer.  Black clothes black nails?  Im a pussy.  An innocent little kitty pretending to be Catwoman.  This man could kill me over and over until my nine lives are done.  I absolutely adored Ripped and have now added Mackenna to my list of favorite book boyfriends!  ARC provided by the publisher in return for an honest review

Katy Evans has written an intensely sexy book which perfectly ends Brooke and Remys roller coaster ride that began in Real.  Katys intimate portrayal of Remys innermost thoughts and feelings is always fascinating and at times heartbreaking as the reader witnesses his constant struggle to love be loved and simply live in the world.  Remy is not a standalone book by any means and I recommend you read Real and Mine first.  Katy has created an unforgettable character in Remington Tate and her books have resonated with legions of fans myself included.  I absolutely loved reading Remys POV and devoured this book almost in one sitting.  Remy is almost painfully flawed as a human being but is also desperate find love and some kind of balance in his life.  His struggles are for me the crux of this story.  I loved him through all his highs and lows and hoped he would get his HEA!  You know you are getting loads of steamy sex if you have read Real and Mine.  And Katy Evans really delivers on the hot and VERY primal sex scenes in Remy.  Whew!  It is Remys POV after all.  Remy and Brookes scenes together are totally hot.  And very very satisfying.  I absolutely loved the conclusion to Remy and Brookes story but I was a little sad to reach the end of this book!  Like all of Katys fervent fans l feel very connected to Remy and Brooke and hope that we hear a little more from them in the next two books Ripped and Raw.  I give Remy  swoony stars!  ARC provided by the publisher in exchange for an honest review

I love her more than anyone should love anything.  The kind of love that either fills you up or eats away at you.  I love her at my own risk.  I love her dangerously.  I call this book The One Where Karina Halle Rips Your Heart Out and Stuffs It Down Your Throat.  In AWMCTL we feel every drop of Dexs anguish about his feelings for Perry.  It is told from Dexs POV and because this is a spoilerfree review lets just say that the author really knows how to wring every drop of honesty and truth from her characters.  Shut the fuck up man.  Get over it.  Shape up or ship out.  Dont think I wasnt yelling those things in my head.  But when the fuck did my head and heart get along anyway?  They were mortal enemies now sworn to rip each other to shreds.  But since this part of the EIT series after all there is still plenty of action to go around.  When Dex is abruptly summoned by Little Fifteen aka Ada to help Perry he doesnt hesitate to jump right back into the fray to save Perry from mortal danger.  Youre my light in all this madness Perry I whispered knowing she couldnt hear me.  Obviously I cant wait to see where the author takes Dex and Perry in Come Alive Book  to be released on June  !And With Madness Comes the LightKarina Halle

Rare and Precious Things is a beautiful lyrical book taking the reader on a wonderful journey with two beloved characters Ethan and Brynne as they navigate the sometimetreacherous waters of newlymarried couples.  Raine Miller has written a fantastic intriguing and SUPER hot conclusion to Ethan and Brynnes story.  Could there be a hotter book husband than Ethan Blackstone?  I really dont think so!  Ethan filled me up on a steady thrust his hands at my hips for leverage.  He made that breathy groan of pleasure that I loved to hear from him as he sank into me.  Feel that my beauty.  All of itjust for you.  As a newlywed and expectant mother Brynne still feels a little insecure even though Ethan is clearly devoted to her.  She is a plainspoken woman and not yet totally comfortable in the rarefied atmosphere of Ethan Blackstones world.  Good sex wasnt love.  For me honest devotion and loyalty was love.  Ethan sees Brynne as his safe harbor and his comfort from his inner turmoil and PTSD.  The alternating POVs work perfectly here and kept me turning the pages late into the night.  Raine Miller writes THE most amazing sex scenes without being cliche or overdone.  Of course her characters have a deep connection after all they have been through together but it is still vital that I feel emotionally connected too and I absolutely felt connected to Ethan and Brynne.  Ethan is still battling his inner demons and Brynne must still contend with characters from her painful past.  Nothing in the story is rushed nothing is as expected and all is brought to an incredibly satisfying conclusion in Rare and Precious Things.  A must read!  Every day since the first day you have made my life worth living.  You make me wake up every single day knowing that I am a blessed man.  ARC provided by the author in return for an honest review.

. stars!!  E.K.  Blair has written yet another extremely gripping and powerful story covering the events surrounding Candaces trauma but told from Ryans POV.  I am a big fan of the male POV so this book was right up my alley even though it deals with some highly sensitive subjects.  If you have read the first two books in the Fading series which I highly recommend then you know that these books tackle some very tough issues including rape and its aftermath.  Falling is beautifully and emotionally written and even includes a healthy dose of romance and steamy scenes.  Ryans personality has been shaped by extreme violence in his past and we get some insight into the initially coldhearted SOB that he was before he met Candace.  Parts of this book are very difficult to read but the main characters all grow and change and find some measure of peace by the conclusion of the story.  The author has written a fabulous ending that did not disappoint.  I loved this book and highly recommend the entire Fading series.  ARC provided by the author in return for an honest review.

. stars!  This is the perfect book to kick off your summer holiday reading!  The Mourning After was more than we expected and really delivers a sexy satisfying and entertaining story.  Georgia buys a beach house at the Carolina shore and plans to spend the summer renovating the house into a possible bed and breakfast.  She leaves Washington D.C.  and her longtime boyfriend Kyle.  At the beach she meets the very sexy Tristan and fights their attraction because of her relationship with Kyle.  This might sound a little predictable but its not.  Tristan makes her question whether she should sacrifice true love for the sake of others.  Georgia on the other hand is loyal to Kyle and believes love is not worth anything if you hurt others to be together.  I want to be with you.  I cant get you out of my head.  Of course Tristan is superhot and the story is full of MEGAsteamy scenes plus plenty of emotion.  Will Georgia stay with Kyle or will she follow her heart and let Tristan love her?  I want you all of you Georgia.  And I want you to want me too.  No spoilers but the title hints that a tragedy has occurred and the events surrounding this incident are explained near the end of the story.  This lifealtering event also sheds light on Georgias sometimesaggravating actions during the story.  In keeping with a discussion I had with one of my favorite authors at Book Bash I am keeping this review SHORT and TO THE POINT!  Did we like this book?  Yes!  Do we recommend it?  Yes!  It is a great summer read and will keep you turning the pages to the very end.  An ARC was provided by the author in exchange for an honest review.  The Mourning AfterAdriane Leigh

./ stars!  This book was a totally unexpected read!  As a fan of Tara Sivecs Chocolate Lovers series I was completely surprised by the very emotional tone of WATCH OVER ME.  The author takes you through every painful step of Addisons troubled journey in her attempts to recover from her mothers death as well as deal with her fathers alcohol addiction.  She must also bear the burden of managing her familys bakery business.  She struggles through each day and barely holds things together.  Addison then meets the wonderful Zander and it seems as if she is finally learning to work through her grief.  He accepts her unconditionally emotional problems and all.  Addison is also receiving counseling which seems to be helping her live a full and normal life.  Then the author throws in a few major plot twists which will totally surprise you!  The story caught me completely off guard and I absolutely loved the direction the author took with this book.  Do not read any reviews with spoilers its best if you read this book without knowing too much detail about the plot!  The cast of supporting characters is also very wellwritten and their presence really added to the storyline.  If you like a solidly emotional story with a really surprising plot twist or two then WATCH OVER ME is for you!Watch Over MeTara Sivec

What a surprise!!   FANTASTiC COULDNTPUTITDOWN STARS!  Ill admit it.  Even though I am addicted to reading sometimes I get a little jaded...And then a book like Tangled comes along and BAM!  Just like that Im addicted to reading again.  Seriously a book that cites Braveheart the Borg an NYU sex study and frogs?  Im in.  Tangled is one of the most original books I have ever read.  Told from the main male character Drews POV the very talented author gives the reader a peek into how guys really feel and think:  Every healthy man in the world wakes up with a stiffy.  A fatty.  Morning wood.  Im sure theres some medical explanation for the phenomenon but I just like to think of it as a little present from God.  Drew is insanely attractive smart hardworking and very wealthy.  Sounds cliche right?  In the hands of this talented author Drew is one of the most memorable and original characters I have ever encountered!  I love Drews inner monologues.  They are both hysterically funny and very very touching.  Hes a selfconfessed womanizer who meets his match in the very smart and gorgeous Kate Brooks.  He falls hard for Kate and all his old rules about women and dating fly out the window.  Women fall in love quicker than men.  Easier and more often.  But when guys fall?  We go down harder.  And when things go bad?  When its not us who ends it?  We dont get to walk away.  We crawl.   The author has described the genre of Tangled as Comedic Erotica and Funny Smut.  Both phrases describe this book to a tee.  It is both hilarious and very very intense.  I started reading this book past midnight and did not want to put it down.  Seriously its that addictive.  Dont waste time reading this review.  Start reading Tangled.  You will absolutely fall in love with Drew!  ARC provided by the publisher in exchange for an honest review.TangledEmma Chase
Breathtaking!!  Full review on May th.

Gorgeouslywritten very sexy story!  Nina Lane continues to enchant and delight in the second book in the Spiral of Bliss series!  What can be said to add to the many star reviews for Allure other than to say it is a mustread?  The author has once again crafted a deeply erotic and romantic storyline that will keep you turning the pages well into the wee hours of the morning.  Allure picks up where Arouse left off.  Since there is a surprise at the end of Arouse I absolutely recommend that you read Arouse first.  Once again the author uses a dual POV that switches seamlessly between Olivia and Dean.  And once again Ms.  Lane knocks it out of the park with the sex scenes!  Just when you think you have read it all before along comes a book like Allure to show you just how stunningly beautiful erotica can be.  Allure reveals more about the development of Dean and Livs relationship told in flashbacks woven into the current story.  He was very careful with her in the beginning and always treated her as a treasure.  Be with me Liv he said.  Just be with me.  Liv fell hard for the professor despite the barriers she had erected to protect herself:  I was crazy about him.  I loved the way he invested everything with such purpose the way he focused his attention on me and really listened when I talked.  I move closer to him and tuck my face into the juncture of his shoulder.  Breathe in the scent of his skin.  Feel his heart beating against my palm.  Dean and Olivia must travel to California due to a family crisis and it is there that many of the crucial events in the book unfold.  We meet Deans family and Helen his former wife.  The author does an amazing job of introducing all of these characters and filling in Deans backstory.  No spoilers but there is one character that I feel is very misunderstood and who I would LOVE to see get their own book!  Dean and Liv are deeply connected and very much in love but will their relationship be strong enough to withstand the several distressing events that occur in Allure?  There is an absolutely incredible storyline that will leave you wanting much much more.  I am anxiously awaiting the continuation of Dean and Livs story in Awaken.  Allure is a mustread dont miss out!  AllureNina Lane

Wonderful story that tackles a very emotional subject with great sensitivity and grace.  There is no one size fits all when it comes to recovering from a traumatic assault.  Loved Ryan and cant wait for his story.
Sexy biker book with a twist or two!  Review to follow.

WARNING FROM THE AUTHOR: Wanderlust is a dark erotic novel which explores dubious consent captivity and power play.  Not intended for those uncomfortable with the subject matter or under eighteen.  Wanderlust is one of our top books of !  I am a big fan of dark erotica so the authors warning and the subject matter did not scare me away and you shouldnt shy away from this story either!  The author has crafted a heartwrenching tale of pain survival and love that will leave you wanting much more of Evie and Hunters story.  Can love come from pain?  This is the theme of Wanderlust.  Our heroine Evie is running away from a painful past and searching for emotional and physical freedom while on a trek across the U.S.  to see Niagra Falls.  Hunter is a trucker and lets just say they have a fateful encounter while on the open road.  Is Hunter a monster?  I dont think so and in fact I LOVED his character.  Will Evie find the freedom she is seeking?  Read the story and you will find out.  Ms.  Warren has created two richlydrawn characters that haunted me long after I finished their story.  I was immediately drawn into Evie and Hunters lives and I felt a deep connection with them from the beginning of the story.  That connection is essential to me as a reader and that is why I feel so strongly about this story and the author.  No spoilers here.  Suffice it to say the storyline is absolutely surprising and incredibly fulfilling.  The sex scenes in this book are disturbing graphic and very very satisfying.  Wanderlust was the first book I have read by Skye Warren and I look forward to reading many more of her stories.WanderlustSkye Warren

I see him.  I feel him.  I want him.  Sensual erotic and filled with emotion and desire Mine delivers a onetwo punch that will leave you completely stunned and satisfied at the same time.  Katy Evans has written Remy Tate as the ultimate passionate and raw Alpha male with Brooke as his willing and devoted woman.  I found Mine to be even more sensuallycharged than Real more sexual and more erotic.  Remy is hot he is hard and he is filled with love and protectiveness for Brooke.  This is an intense love story above all and the burning sex between these two will have you needing a cold shower or ice!  to cool down.  Do I judge a book by its cover?  Yes I do and I couldnt possibly have enjoyed reading the gorgeous paperback ARC any more than I did.  Read isnt quite accurate I ripped through the pages!  Read Mine.  And try not to melt into a puddle while youre reading it!

I enjoyed the latest book in the Cut  Run series.  With that being said there is an awful lot going on in this book and the focus is not totally on Ty and Zane but is also shared by Nick and Kelly.  The story takes our group to Scotland for a wedding celebration.  Much mystery occurs with lots of action.  Of course my favorite parts of the book are the hot sexy times between Ty and Zane and the sometimes humorous banter between them.  Abigail Roux writes some deliciously steamy scenes and I wanted more more more!  All of the characters are welldeveloped and it seems like the focus might be on Nick and Kelly later.  If you like a lot of fastpaced action a good mystery and some really really hot Alpha guys then you will love Ball  Chain.  I absolutely love Abigail Rouxs wriritng style and look forward to reading many more of her books.  ARC provided by the publisher in return for an honest review.

.its hard to feel bad for her because as much as shes hurting she doesnt know pain.  She doesnt know it like I know it.  I keep pain alive.  I keep it in business.  I keep it thriving with as much as I experience it.  GAH!!  My heart.  I am in love with Miles Archer.  Another fantastic story from Colleen Hoover.  One of my favorites!

Ambrosia picks up where Metamorphosis left us  with a sudden tragedy that leaves Scarlett reeling and unable to deal with the two men in her life the sexy handsome playboy Ash and the sexy handsome musician Mason.  Scarlett began her journey in Metamorphosis by starting her freshman year at Rice University.  She meets Ash with whom she falls in love but who pushes her away due to her innocence and sweetness.  But they cant stay away from each other and try to remain friends.  Ash is HOT and actually a very loving man.  But Mason also captures Scarletts heart and Ambrosia explores Scarletts emotional and sexual awakening.  Will she choose Ash or Mason?  No spoilers here but I will say her behavior and choices were sometimes very aggravating!  Ambrosia is filled with lots of missed opportunities a few misunderstandings and oh yeah LOTS of supersteamy sex scenes.  Erin Noelle writes a very captivating story in Ambrosia with lots of very memorable characters.  This is a great book for those who enjoy a somewhat angsty story where the plot is not wrapped up with a tidy little bow.  I am very much looking forward to the next installment in this series!  And Im Team Ash all the way!  ARC provided by the author in exchange for an honest review
Wonderful book!  Full review to follow

ArouseNina Lane   / blissful stars!  Finally an erotic novel where the marriage IS the story not just an epilogue  One day Im going to touch you in a thousand different ways and show you how to touch me he said.  And he did.  Struggling with a tormented past undergraduate Olivia Winter once led a practical but isolated life.  Then she met Professor Dean West a brilliant scholar of medieval history who melted Livs inhibitions and taught her the meaning of both love and erotic pleasure.  But after three years of a blissful lusty marriage Liv and Dean now face a crisis that threatens everything they believe about each other.  And when dark secrets and temptations rise to the surface the fallout might break them apart forever.  Nina Lane gives us two very relatable characters in Olivia and Dean.  Her writing is superb and the story kept me reading furiously until the end.  And did I mention that I am in love with Professor Dean West?  He is a totally hot alpha male who is also an intelligent and very wellrespected university professor.  Liv he said his voice rough with tenderness  you dont have to be afraid.  Why not?  Because Ill slay monsters for you.  Arouse gives us a candid peek into the inner workings of a onceperfect marriage between two somewhat damaged people.  Olivia had a troubled childhood which left her scarred in many ways.  Dean is her first love slightly older and very very sexy.  He literally sweeps her off her feet.  Something comes between them and they both must struggle with their own emotions as they deal with how these events will affect their marriage and their very tight bond.  I love him to my bones but suddenly Im wondering what I might have been without him.  I am not sure why the married couple theme has been mentioned as not being everyones cup of tea.  Olivia and Dean have an intense sexual relationship and Ms.  Lane knows how to write erotic scenes that will knock your socks off!  I also loved reading Deans POV after the midpoint of the book it was a refreshing switch and gave me a lot of insight into his behavior during the first part of the book.  Ill be here beauty.  Waiting for you.  This was my first book by Nina Lane.  I absolutely love her writing style.  Arouse is a brilliantlywritten look into the inner workings of a real relationship.  I LOVE Olivia and Dean and cant wait to dive right into Allure!

REALKaty Evans  FIVE HOT AND EMOTIONAL STARS!  Summary:  A fallen boxer.  A woman with a broken dream.  A competition...  He even makes me forget my name.  One night was all it took and I forgot everything and anything except the sexy fighter in the ring who sets my mind ablaze and my body on fire with wanting...  Remington Tate is the strongest most confusing man Ive ever met in my life.  Hes the star of the dangerous underground fighting circuit and Im drawn to him as Ive never been drawn to anything in my life.  I forget who I am what I want with just one look from him.  When hes near I need to remind myself that I am strongbut he is stronger.  And now its my job to keep his body working like a perfect machine his taut muscles primed and ready to break the bones of his next opponents .  But the one hes most threatening to now is me.  I want him.  I want him without fear.  Without reservations.  If only I knew for sure what it is that he wants from me?  Release Date  April    Review:  Remington Tate is everything Ive never ever done...  Not sure why I decided to give this new author a try but I am so glad I did!  I immediately fell in love with both Brooke and Remy.  Real is a great debut novel from Katy Evans.  Remington Riptide Tate will steal your heart right from the beginning.  He is a brute of a man an athlete competitor and superstar underground fighter with a huge following.  He desperately wants Brooke Dumas to see him for the real person that he is serious problems and all.  Brooke has her own issues but really knows and understands the thrill of sports competition.  He wants to be my real not my adventure.  Remy and Brookes attraction is instant but its a slow burn leading up to the first time they get together:  My panties are soaked and my pulse has gone haywire.  Ive never  condoned violence.  This isnt me and I blink in stupefaction at the  sensations whipping through my system.  Lust pure whitehot lust  flutters through my nerve endings.  I dont want to give away any spoilers so I will just say that this story has a great twist that hooked me in right from the beginning.  I read this book quickly but at the same time did not want it to end.  Loved the Epilogue and hope to see more of these characters from Ms.  Evans.  And Id give up forever to touch you...  Cause I know that you feel me somehow...  Youre the closest to heaven that Ive ever been and I dont want to  go home right now.  I want you to know who I am.  Thank you Ms.  Evans for introducing us to Remy.  Cant wait for more.  ARC provided by author in exchange for an honest review

Fantastical Stars!  What makes a hero is the one thats left standing when the others are dead.  Or the one that gave his life so the others could live.  Thats a fuckin hero.  Midnight Soul is the conclusion of the Fantasyland series with Noctorno Noc Hawthorne and Franka Drakkar who was truly evil in the previous books in this series.  But in trademark Kristen Ashley style Frankas true side is shown and all of her secrets are revealed.  She has endured terrible abuse for years to protect her brother and his family which she has hidden from everyone around her.  Not and Franka begin a very slowburn romance that at first begins as a friendship and partnership.  Kristen Ashley expertly weaves fantasy paranormal and reality with touches of comedy and as always a beautiful and enduring romance.  The scenes of Franka and others from her world being introduced to the modern world are funny and thoughtprovoking and always entertaining.  Noc sees the real Franka and his love transforms her.  I always tell friends who dont usually read fantasy that Kristen Ashleys books are magical and engrossing and Midnight Soul is no exception.  The journey that Franka takes is filled with forgiveness and redemption and yes a swoony Alpha who will stop at nothing to protect Franka and her loved ones.  Midnight Soul is an imaginative and sexy conclusion to the Fantasyland series.  It is filled with unforgettable characters and as always a magnificent Epilogue!  You dont have a midnight soul Frannie.  Your soul is so bright I look too close Id be blinded.  ARC provided by the author in return for an honest review.
Nice and angsty!  Sexy and very emotional story.  Team Ash all the way.  But I have a soft spot for Mason!

. stars!!  I loved this book!  Alice Clayton writes with the perfect mix of wit tenderness and hot romance.  Grace is sort of an Every Woman navigating the sharkinfested waters of Hollywood as she pursues her lifelong dream of acting.  She is insecure she is very funny and she is very passionate.  Jack is also very witty and totally HOT and is very much in love with the mucholder Grace.  The dark forces of stardom and fame start to pull Jack and Grace apart.  Her star is on the rise as he falls in with the wrong crowd and succumbs to the pressures of life in Hollywood.  I could not put this book down and absolutely loved Alice Claytons writing filled with wit warmth and SUPER steamy sex scenes!  This book is funny wellwritten and fastpaced.  I highly recommend this series.  I loved the ending but I dont want to say goodbye to Jack and Grace!  ARC provided by the publisher in return for an honest review.

Come to Me Quietly is the first book I have read by A.L.  Jackson and I absolutely loved it!  The author has written an exquisite story of second chances and the healing power of love.  The book switches back and forth between the present and the past and builds up a fantastic sense of foreboding that is sustained throughout the entire story.  Aly and Jared were inseparable as kids until a monumental event occurred that changed their lives forever.  Jared has now reunited with Aly and her older brother Christopher but he is the classic tortured bad boy full of pentup anger and unresolved feelings.  Aly cannot resist Jared and their scenes together are breathtaking.  They share a history together making their relationship all the more deeper and meaningful.  I loved how the pieces of this story were woven together coming together perfectly at the end into a wonderful conclusion.  Come to Me Quietly is a powerful impeccably written story filled with tremendous emotion tenderness and love.  A mustread!

A very sexy and emotional debut book from author Jessica Ingro!  Sams story drew me right in she really loved her husband Aiden but felt very disconnected from him due to their lack of intimacy.  The author does a great job describing the intense attraction between Sam and her old flame Jacob and the sex scenes in this book are incredibly hot and steamy.  Jacob is actually a very nice guy and there really are no bad people in this book unless you judge Sam for her unfaithfulness to her husband.  I did find some of her behavior towards the end of the book to be a little meanspirited but the author justifies Sams actions in the end.  All in all this is a very gripping very sexy and fairly fastpaced read and I loved the twists at the end.  A very creative way to conclude this story!  Stay tuned!  There will be more to come from these characters.

Breathtaking and ultimately beautiful.  This is NOT just a simple retelling of Hopeless!  Colleen Hoover once again weaves an emotionally powerful often painful and always beautiful story that you will not be able to put down.  Seeing the events of Hopeless from Holders point of view the reader is given insight into the circumstances surrounding certain tragic events from Hopeless and also into Holders actions in Hopeless.  This will be spoilerfree for those who have not yet read Hopeless and because this is being written prior to release day.  If you think there is nothing new that can be written about Holder and Skys story you are wrong!  Losing Hope is an incredibly sensitive and very sexy!  book written by a masterful storyteller.  Ms.  Hoover has actually made me fall more in love with Holder than I already was!  Theyre so perfect I say.  Like hearts.  I could literally stare at your lips for days and never get bored.   Holder  You will be emotionally drained after reading Losing Hope but it feels oh so good.  Make no mistake this is a heartwrenching story.  But there are no extraneous characters in this story and no weak plot points.  Every character and every event is perfectly meaningful and necessary.  My attention is constantly homed in on her like Im a compass and shes my North.   Holder  You should definitely read Hopeless first because it is amazing story.  With that being said you will love Losing Hope if you are a fan of Hopeless because it is a passionate fresh and lyrical story.  Enjoy.

Ellie Watt is consumed with revenge.  She plans an elaborate scheme to trick her way into the inner circle of Travis the criminal she blames for her life of pain.  She focuses her attention on Javier as part of her scheme but she most certainly does not plan on falling in love.  Simple story right?  In the hands of Karina Halle it becomes a rich story of lust of love and loss sin and redemption and trust and betrayal.  Ellie thinks she is control of her emotions but she falls fast and hard for Javier and who wouldnt?  He is handsome protective and worships Ellie.  He is also a member of a violent drug cartel.  I want your heart your soul and your body.  I want the you that youre hiding deep inside.  I must have her.   Javier  I need you my Angel.  And Ill do anything and everything to keep you.   Javier  He wasnt good and he wasnt bad.  He was just Javier.  And he was mine.   Ellie  Ms.  Halle has created some very memorable characters that will get under your skin and into your heart.  I dreaded the ending of the book and cant wait for Ellies story to continue in Shooting Scars The Artists Trilogy  expected May  .  On Every Street is a prequel to Sins  Needles but is itself a standalone story.  You do not need to read Sins  Needles first.  But read it it is one of my favorite books!  ARC provided by the author in exchange for an honest review.  On Every StreetKarina Halle

. stars!  Step outside your comfort zone and take a trip to Sector Four with The Beyond series by Kit Rocha.  I never imagined a dystopic series could be so gripping erotic gritty and thoroughly surprising as these books by Kit Rocha.  Although the authors tried to create a standalone with Beyond Jealousy and it definitely can be read on its own you will miss the rich background stories on the other characters in this book and I recommend picking this series up from the beginning.  Ace Rachel and Cruz are the heart of BEYOND JEALOUSY and we are treated to a SIZZLING menage between these three very different and stubborn characters.  I have always said you dont know Alpha until you meet an OKane and Cruz and Ace are no exceptions.  This is a world of graphic sex unbridled pleasure strong women and freeflowing booze.  This is a surprisingly emotional story as we get to delve into the insecurities and passions forming this incredible threesome.  Kit Rocha writes some of the most intense erotic and steamy sex scenes I have ever read and BEYOND JEALOUSY is no exception!  Rachel Cruz and Ace form one memorable menage that I will not soon forget!  It wouldnt be a fdup triangle if they met in the middle.  It would be straightup fg.  These three really care about each other and that forms the heart of the story.  I highly recommend BEYOND JEALOUSY as well as the entire BEYOND series.  Dystopia doesnt sound half bad with the like of the OKane men and women!  around.  ARC provided by author in return for an honest review

Profane imaginative and sexy.  .Beyond ShameKit Rocha  There is nothing more exciting for a reader than to pick up a new book by an unfamiliar author and be totally swept away.  Beyond Shame might be the most sexually charged book I have ever read and I loved every minute.  Noelles discovery that she can be totally free sexually and otherwise in Sector Four makes for some thrilling reading.  Beyond Shame is like a Kristen Ashley story on crack.  The men are hot they are sexy and the sex scenes are like nothing I have ever read.  Even getting inked turns into an erotic experience for Noelle.  Loved the dystopic storyline and that the female characters are free to make their own choices.  Jasper and Noelle are unforgettable characters.  Favorite quotes:  If itll bother you when the men start fighting over her you better get straight.  Because that girl wants it and when she gets around to admitting it the boys are gonna give it to her.   Dallas  Shed have to give up everything to belong to him  her secrets her body her shame.  It might all be worth it if he could set her free.  Im going to show you what it means to be mine with nothing held back.   Jasper  Give this book a try.  You wont be sorry.  Beyond Control Book  will be available March th .  You can read the first chapter at www.kitrocha.com

If you like your writing fueled by a little testosterone then Karina Halles The Artist Trilogy series is for you.  Before you read any further you MUST first read Sins  Needles Book  or the novella On Every Street before Shooting Scars.  Both books provide a rich and detailed look into the minds and motivations of the three main characters Ellie Camden and Javier.  With that said buckle up because Shooting Scars is one hell of a ride.  Shooting Scars plunges back into the action right where Sins  Needles ended.  Ellie and Camden are thrown into an impossible situation which leaves Ellie back with Javier the former love of her life.  Does she hate him?  Does she love him?  All is revealed in painfully beautiful detail in Shooting Scars.  Ellie Cam and Javier are all incredibly complicated characters.  What I love about Karina Halles writing is that there is no black and white no good or evil no angels or demons in my opinion.  Each character has their own complex motivations for their behavior and Karina refreshingly lets the reader form their own opinions about the characters.  I dont want to describe the plot in detail here because Shooting Scars is a very intricate tale that is best enjoyed fresh.  Shooting Scars is filled with lots of action romance and twists and turns.  Is it painful?  Hell yes.  And that is why it is such an amazing story.  My problem?  I need Bold Tricks like yesterday.  A copy was provided by Grand Central Publishing for review  Favorite Quotes:  Unanswered questions can stay with you a long time riding on your shoulders wearing you down.  Such an angry little angel.  Your wings are certainly dirty.  Theyre black.  He made me feel safe.  Whether I was in his arms or at his side or just in his presence.  For the first time in my life I had a protector  and I never knew I needed one until then.  He was like a fragment from my dream a faded portrait of masculinity heart and ink.

Kristen Ashley is my favorite author.  Her books make my heart pound get my pulse racing make me cry make me laugh and wrap me always in a cocoon of family friendship and love.  Could you ask anything more from a writer?  And Wild And Free the third installment in the Three Series does all of that and much much more.  Wild and Free contains some of the rawest animalistic sensual and gorgeous love scenes I have ever read.  Abel and Lilah destined to be mates for life need to be able to draw you in to their characters and their fated mating for this to be a believable story.  And boy do they ever!  Just when I think Ms.  Ashley could not possibly create a more Alpha male than she already has she writes Abel who is a hybrid and who mates like nobodys business!  This book contains everything you could possibly hope for in a paranormal romance.  There is incredible heartstopping action hot sex otherwordly beings superhot sex wolves vampires and heartpounding sex!  I absolutely loved Abel and his story broke my heart.  Lilah is a kickass heroine brave uninhibited sexual.  loyal and loving.  These two together just might save the world.  I could not put this book down and was literally swooning at every page.  Even if you are not a big fan of paranormal romance and I do not read a lot of them Wild And Free is a MUSTREAD.  This book is truly Kristen Ashley at her finest.  She is not afraid to pull the punches and make sacrifices when they work for the story.  And for that I love her.  Be prepared to be wowed.  Wild And Free has loads of unexpected twists and turns and it is a vital addition to your KA library!  ARC provided by the author with thanks for an honest review.

LOVED this book.  Wished it was longer!  It is such a wonderful feeling to find an author who really knows how to WRITE.  This is a beautiful love story about two lonely people looking for love and intimacy.  The characters of Sabian and Jocelyn are welldeveloped there is plot and tension and there are totally thrilling and HOT sex scenes.  This was a completely surprising and fantastic book for me.  I could not put it down.  My heart broke a little during this book because of the predicament of the two main characters.  And because Sabian is a male prostitute well you can imagine how freaking steamy the sex scenes are!  Dont have time to put my favorite quotes here I have to go read more books by Lauren Gallagher and L.A.  Witt!  READ this book!

. stars scorching hot sex scenes and great characters but the grammar took away from my enjoyment of the story.

I was thrilled when Sylvain Reynard announced that there would be a final book in the Gabriels Inferno Series.  I could not get enough of Gabriel and Julianne and reread both Gabriels Inferno and Gabriels Rapture several times when they were first released.  Gabriels Redemption the third book in the series is immensely satisfying and stunningly written.  Even descriptions of simple acts such as eating or studying take on rich and layered meanings when written by Sylvain Reynard.  And the love scenes between Gabriel and his beloved Julia took my breath away.  In the months since their marriage their desire had not abated nor had the sweetness of their coupling.  All speech melted into motion and touch and the bliss of physical love.  This story takes place shortly after their marriage and shows the struggles that Gabriel and Julia  like most couples  must go through while building a life together.  Will Gabriel overcome the guilt he feels about his past?  Will Julia be able to reconcile Gabriels burning desire to start a family with her own educational ambitions?  She too feels guilt and conflicting emotions over Gabriels plans for their future together.  Gabriel was a consuming fire.  His passion his desires all seemed to overtake the desires of those around him.  Hed told her once that she was the only woman whod ever said no to him.  He was probably correct.  Sylvain Reynard weaves in many Old Testament references which enrich the love story between Gabriel and Julia.  Nicely balanced with the heavy themes of love forgiveness and redemption are the funny comments by the Snarky Narrator which lend an air of levity to the book.  The secondary characters that I love also make appearances in this book.  Professor Picton is a strong influence on Julia and helps to guide her in making certain lifealtering decisions including dealing with the evil Christa who is still out to make trouble for the Emersons.  We also see a glimpse into Paul Norris life and the dangerous Simon and Natalie also make appearances.  Gabriels devotion to Julia remains unwavering and I loved reading their scenes together.  He still battles with feelings of inadequacy but Julias goodness helps him overcome his deepseated feelings of guilt and selfloathing.  Almost six months into their marriage he loved her more than before he envied the very air she breathed.  I also loved the way in which Julia grew as a person in this book and became much stronger in her educational studies and in dealing with her professors and others who conspire against her.  She also stands up to Gabriel who is certainly a force to be reckoned with.  Gabriel too grows as a person as he uncovers facts about his past that help him find closure to certain events in his life and bring him some measure of peace.  I suppose were all on our own spiritual journeys.  Some of us are further along than others.  Sylvain Reynard did a spectacular job of concluding Julia and Gabriels story in this book.  Once again Sylvain delivers a richly detailed and deeplyfelt story that will stay with you long after you finish the last word.  I was sobbing at the sheer beauty of this book and cant wait to read more from Sylvain Reynard.  ARC provided by the publisher in exchange for an honest review.  And here is my one and only Professor Gabriel O. Emerson:

Very intense emotional read  Emma has escaped to the US from England to begin a new life at an American college after a very traumatic family incident.  She and Scott and very drawn to each other and Emma tries to fight her intense attraction to him.  Scott is a HOT musician but has a very sweet and loving side to him.  This is not your typical YA book and contains some very emotional angsty scenes and some very thrilling sex between Emma and Scott.  Definitely a sequel coming based on the ending.  I like the authors writing style but found myself yelling at Emma throughout the book due to her constant pulling away from Scott!  Looking forward to more from this author.  Rocked UnderCora Hawkes

James is sexy gorgeous tattooed and everything that Tate thinks she needs to run away from. What the fuck had happened?  Had she killed him?   James  He felt feverish out of control famished like hed been waiting for this for ages.  There werent going to be any fancy moves from him.  Just starknaked hunger.   James  It amazed her how giving James was.  He didnt seem afraid of anything he was so sure of her it scared the living shit out of her.   Tate  A MUSTREAD BOOK!  More than Meets the InkElle Aycart
Hot and steamy.  Review to follow..

Beauty From PainGeorgia Cates  UNEXPECTED  STAR READ  Very few books draw me in like Up in the Air All In Gabriels Inferno Bared To You etc. but this book did.  After reading This Man earlier in January it was hard to find characters and a storyline that would keep me up all night but thanks to Georgia Cates I now have Laurelyn and Jack.  This story had me riveted from the first page when Jack proposes an unusual arrangement to Laurelyn upon her arrival for a  month summer visit to Australia.  She accepts and they embark on a HOT relationship.  I wont call it a romance because neither one agrees to that at least at first.  I loved the Australian setting but I will admit I had to look up a few slang words.  Sanger sandwich  Oldies  parents  Coldie  beer  Brekkie  breakfast  Favorite quotes:  You treat me like Im somebody instead of a nobody.  Ive been wanting to devour this mouth since the first time I saw you.  Jack you dont always know the true worth of a womans love until it becomes a memory.  There is a cliffhanger ending of course but the author treats us to a delicious Prologue.  The sex between Jack and Laurelyn is super HOT but I really felt a connection between the two thanks to Ms.  Cates writing.  More Jack please!  And make it quick!

A beautiful beautiful book about tragedy life love and forgiveness.  Kacey has been through a terrible tragedy and flees with her little sister Livie to Miami to begin a new life.  Kacey has sacrificed her own dreams of college to take care of her younger sister and put her through high school.  They move into an apartment complex with a cast of characters including wonderful new friends and one gorgeous neighbor Trent Emerson.  Kacey tries to numb her emotions and tries to push everyone away who cares about her.  I absolutely loved how this story unfolded and I found myself really rooting for Kacey to overcome her past tragedy and let her emotions in!  There is FANTASTIC chemistry between Kacey and Trent.  I also loved the other characters especially Kaceys little sister Livie.  A wonderfully written book that does not disappoint.Ten Tiny BreathsK.A.  Tucker

Sins  NeedlesKarina Halle  SYNOPSIS:  Ellie Watt is used to starting over.  The daughter of a grifting team Ellie spent her childhood being used as a pawn in her parents latest scam.  Now shes much older wiser and ready to give her con artist life a rest.  But returning to the dry desert town of Palm Valley California means one more temptation than she bargained for  Camden McQueen.  Once known as the high school weirdo Camden is bigger and badder than the boy he used to be and a talented tattoo artist with his own thriving business.  Ellies counting on Camden still being in love with her but what shes not counting on is how easily unrequited love can turn into obsession over time.  When Camden discovers Ellies plan to con him he makes her a deal she doesnt dare refuse but her freedom comes with a price and its one that takes both Ellie and Camden down a dangerous road.  I wish I could do justice to this book but I am not eloquent enough.  This is a stunning story that will break your heart thrill you and leave you wanting much much more.  It is difficult to write a review of this book without giving away any of the major plot twists.  Karina Halle is a very gifted storyteller with an incredibly sensitive voice.  I stayed up very very late to finish this book.  I could not wait to see what path Ellie and Camden would take.  And oh yeah there is some very graphic and steamy sex.  It is very gratifying to find an author who can surprise and thrill with such a great story.  There is a very satisfying cliffhanger youll see what I mean!  and thankfully more books planned in this series.  A prequel novella On Every Street is coming on March th featuring the torrid love story of Ellie and Javier.  Shooting Scars TAT  is coming May th   Follow Ms.  Halle on Twitter metalblonde  www.experimentinterror.com  Facebook www.facebook.com/KarinaHalle

SYNOPSIS  Hanna Boudreaux has lived in the small town of Willow all her life.  Shes sweet cute and quiet.  Hanna has a moment of epiphany when she realizes her crush for forever Raiden Ulysses Miller is not ever going to be hers.  She sees her life as narrow and decides to do something about it.  Raiden Miller is the towns local hero.  A former Marine with the medal to prove his hero status he comes home shrouded in mystery.  It takes a while but eventually Hanna catches his eye.  After all these years of Raid and Hanna living in the same town the question is why?  Is Raid interested in Hanna because shes sweet and cute?  Or does Raid have something else going on?  OUR REVIEW  We have had a love affair with all things Kristen Ashley since we first read Knight last year.  Yes Knight was our first foray into Kits world and we have never looked back.  We have read almost every single one of Ms.  Ashleys books.  Each of her series are highly recommended.  Our blog is new so we have not posted all of our reviews yet but we can discuss each character at length and yes we have read every Rock Chick book.  You can imagine our excitement when we were selected to receive an ARC of RAID.  We could not believe it!  Who can resist a book that even had us highlighting the Authors Note?  I have many hearts desires and one of them is the slim chance that my books will guide women to accepting themselves as they are having confidence in their bodies brains and beauty and letting all that poison go so they can enjoy their lives including sexually.  ROCK ON KRISTEN!  We would like to think that there is a litte bit of Ms.  Ashley in the character of Hanna.  She is sweet she is cute she is trusting she has a cat she handknits afghans for a living and she lives in a small town.  She has been crushing on Raiden Miller since she was a young girl.  When he returns to town a war hero and he finally notices her her whole world is turned upside down.  Of course this would not be a proper Unfinished Hero book without a lot of danger a lot of graphic sex and one HOT ALPHA MALE.  You get all that and more with RAID.  We confess that we reread KNIGHT and CREED in one day while in the middle of reading RAID.  Favorite Quotes:  Prefer to be with a woman whos cute and shy and obviously into me.  Means I can save time and get straight to shit that matters.   Raid  Id crawled across a room for Raiden Miller.  And it was him not me who stopped it because I didnt like it.  Which made me look back and like it.   Hanna  Hanna is Raids reward.  We loved this book and would have loved a little more interaction with the other unfinished heroes who appear in this story this is a standalone book but you should read KNIGHT and CREED in that order.  With that said where can we find us a Raiden Ulysses Miller?  RaidKristen Ashley
Badass bikers!  Sex!  Mayhem!  Beauty!  Coffee!  Classic KA.  Review to follow.  P.S.  Hot as fuck Epilogue.Own the WindKristen Ashley

Sheer beauty.   rockin stars for Ally and Rens story!  Whats not to love about Ally Nightingale?  Shes tough shes smart and she feels everything right down to her bones:  Backing up a bit my name is Allyson Nightingale but everyone calls me Ally.  And Im a Rock Chick in name and deed.  YES!  Everything we absolutely love about the Rock Chick series is packed right into the last installment: gorgeous real women hot Alpha heroes and SUPER hot sex!  And of course like the previous Rock Chick stories Ally vehemently denies her true feelings for the gorgeous Ren but lucky for Ally and us!   he knows what he wants and what Ally wants and needs too!  I dont fight fair baby.  I fight to win.  And not one of them looked like you look when I slide inside you every fucking time I slide inside you.  Like a piece of you has been lost and now its found.  Ally and Ren are TOTALLY hot together!  And the storyline is pure Kristen Ashley pure emotion lots of action some danger a few misunderstandings but above all lots of strong hot men and lots of strong gorgeous women!  All of our beloved characters make an appearance in Rock Chick Revolution and theres even a very familiar name coughcough thrown around.  I laughed a lot and I started crying at the introduction.  The road to Ally and Rens HEA was a bumpy one but of course it ends in pure beauty and perfection as only KA can do:  Because when I had to be a badass all day and cases got tough and I came home or when life just sucked or when life was awesome and going along fine I knew this was what Ren Zano would give me.  Always.  Exactly what I needed.  ROCK ON!  A copy of the book was provided by the author in exchange for an honest review.
Magnificent!  Review to follow closer to release day.

Stunning emotional book.  Completely surprising read.  Please dont shy away from this book due to the wartime setting.  Wounded is an emotional satisfying story of two souls brought together by the harsh realities of war.  Rania is a beautiful Iraqi woman who had to resort to prostitution at a very young age in order to simply survive.  She is shut down emotionally until by chance she meets Hunter an American fighting in Iraq.  They cannot communicate at first due to the language barrier but learn to communicate in other ways.  He is asleep.  So handsome.  I do not understand what is happening to me.  From the first moment I saw him something in him called to my blood and made it sing.   Rania  Ms.  Wilder delivers some very lush and explicit sex scenes between Rania and Hunter which were an unexpected surprise.  Rania.  Her name is music.  Her eyes are veiled pools of expression.  She hides behind anger behind toughness.  Its all an act.  I see the pain.  See the fear.  See the need.  Shes lonely.  She hates what she does.    Hunter  The author is a gifted writer with a a sensitive voice.  Wounded is not filled with lighthearted scenes but it is ultimately a story of love and understanding that will leave you fulfilled at the end.

If you want a completely suprising and enthralling read this book is for you.  Reapers Property is a SCORCHING romance with a super hot biker named Horse.  And yes his nickname does refer to a certain part of the male anatomy!  We usually dont give a synopsis in our short and sweet book reviews but just by way of background Marie has fallen on hard times and is trying for a fresh start by moving in with her loser brother Jeff.  Through a series of incidences told through flashbacks which we loved by the way Marie is taken as collateral by Horse a member of the Reapers Motorcycle Club.  There is a lot more to Horse than his badass persona.  We really loved how Ms.  Wylde describes the inner workings of a MC.  Not sure if its all accurate but boy is it interesting!  They have their own code of ethics and do not operate like the rest of the civilian world.  This is a rough book and um its not exactly a traditional romance.  Who knew there was such a distinction between a sweet butt and an old lady!  All we can say is BRAVO to Ms.  Wylde for creating one of the most memorable badass alphas out there.  fans self We cant wait to read more Reapers MC!  Reapers PropertyJoanna Wylde

Five stars to Sempre.  Deeply felt moving love story of loss and redemption.  Carmine and Haven will fill your dreams.

A powerfully written story that will take your breath away.  You will not be able to tear yourself away from the story of Sophie and Ian.  The writing is flawless and the character development perfect.  Unforgettable firstkiss scene!  Seriously this book needs to be made into a movie.  Put this at the top of your toread list for .

Imagine my pleasant surprise when I ended up with an ARC of Walking Disaster.  I was even more surprised to be immediately drawn inside the sensitive loving and intense head of Travis Mad Dog Maddox.  Walking Disaster contains no surprise story lines it is the story of Beautiful Disaster told from the POV of Travis.  You do not need to have read Beautiful Disaster first but I highly recommend that you do in order to understand some of the nuances of the story and the characters.  Travis is loving he is sexy he is kind he is sensitive and he is very very caring.  Yes its true!  Jamie McGuire has created a wonderful caring male character who will become the new book boyfriend to lots of fans.  Travis and his family lost their beloved mother at a young age.  Her last words to Travis were One of these days youre going to fall in love son.  Dont settle for just anyone.  Choose the girl that doesnt come easy the one you have to fight for and then never stop fighting.  Never stop fighting for what you want.  These words serve Travis well when he meets his match in Abby Pidge Abernathy.  Travis knows immediately that Abby is very different from the endless parade of girls that he has been with.  He is aware of his badboy reputation but in his mind he has always been nothing but totally honest with every girl he has ever been with:  She was my opposite: innocent on the surface and damaged deep within.  I was a little frustrated at Abbys stubbornness in constantly pushing Travis away emotionally and physically but smart and sexyass Travis takes his mothers advice and fights hard for Abby!  I knew the second I met you that there was something about you I needed.  It turns out it wasnt something about you at all.  It was just you.  I love a book with an alternate POV so Walking Disaster fit the bill for me.  I enjoyed reading the Las Vegas and fighting scenes from Travis POV.  You will not believe what an intelligent caring and loyal character Travis is.  Finally the author also treats us to a wonderfully surprising and satisfying Epilogue that I can only hope will lead to much more Travis and Abby!  Walking DisasterJamie McGuire

CollideGail McHugh  This book has haunted me since I finished.  Emily Gavin and Dillon really got under my skin.  I so wanted for Emily to leave her boyfriend Dillon and be with Gavin with whom she felt an instant attraction the moment they met.  But she felt bound to Dillon and he uses every narcissistic trick in the book to keep her.  Emilys confusion over her feelings for Dillon are at first understandable  he did help her through some very tough times  but then I found myself yelling at her to leave Dillon and be with Gavin!  The sex scenes I this book are really really hot but I wish there had been more!  I dont want to give away any spoilers but I did enjoy catching a glimpse into what a relationship with a true narcissist might be like .  My heart broke a few times during this book it was a much darker read than I originally expected.  There is a doozy of a cliffhanger and I cant wait to see how this story concludes.  Oh and by the way Gavin Blake is HOT and is a new favorite book boyfriend!

Beautiful BastardChristina Lauren  LOVED THIS BOOK.  Holy hell the sex is hot!  It comes early it comes fast and it comes HARD.  Pun intended.  Its interesting that some reviewers looked at this as a negative but the fact that Chloe and Bennett have sex almost at the beginning of this book is very much a part of the narrative.  They then work backwards and develop their relationship and emotional connection from there.  I couldnt put this book down.  I might be one of the three people in the world who did not read The Office but apparently there are some major differences between the original Twilight fanfic and Beautiful Bastard.  I loved how Bennett and Chloe were loved and respected by everyone else but they could not seem tone be civil towards at each other.  Also loved the back and forth POVs between the two characters.  This book is not for everyone but it is a treat worth reading.  I cant wait for more of Bennett and Chloe!  ARC provided courtesy of NetGalley.

And the sex scenes are STEAMY.  Sequel for Tony?  Pretty please?

Its difficult to write a review of a book that ends one of my favorite series ever.  Did I want Olivia and Calebs story to end?  Absolutely not.  I have been obsessed with these characters ever since I first read The Opportunist.  Was I satisfied with the conclusion?  Completely!  Tarryn Fisher does not give her readers hearts flowers and rainbows she gives flaws secrets and twisted emotions.  You have been warned.  I absolutely love a male POV and Tarryn really delivers in Thief.  The first two books in this series The Opportunist and Dirty Red are absolute mustreads before Thief and the entire series belongs on your immediate toread list.  A perfect star story.

You will yell at the characters and also shed a tear or too!  We thought we despised Leah but to the authors credit Ms.  Fisher does a fabulous job of telling Leahs backstory.  And she does disappoint.  We do not like to give away any spoilers but trust us when we say that you will be shocked saddened and stunned by this book!  Oh Caleb!  We still love you!  Cant wait for Thief!

WOW what a surprising book!  Fabulous story and characters and we could NOT put this one down.  These are not your usual cast of characters they make terrible mistakes and some are filled with anger and dishonesty!  We love love love Caleb.  You will immediately feel the need to read Dirty Red.  Trust us things are not what they seem... We can only hope and pray for a HEA for our Caleb and Olivia.

Put this on your list of must reads ASAP.  One of my top  of .  I dont write long reviews but suffice it to say I was up until AM finishing this book.  Andrew Parrish is my new book boyfriend.  Oh and did I mention the sex is HOT?  Beautiful beautiful story.
A beautiful romance!  I read this in  day could not stop reading until I finished Lauren and Cadens story.  The sex scenes left me breathless and the story had my heart in its clutches!  A must read!

out of  stars to The Stranger Just One Night!  The Stranger is very sexy and suspenseful.  I read it in just one night pun intended.  I was expecting a carbon copy of Fifty Shades or Bared to You but this book is different.  The book is told from the POV of Kasie who has a fling in Las Vegas with a very handsome stranger.  Circumstances later bring them together again which leads to Kasie being torn between being a.  good girl or following her heart.  This book includes some very steamy sex scenes and one very hot guy Mr Dade.  I cant wait to learn more about him in the next book because this one is told from Kasies POV and ends rather abruptly on a huge cliffhanger.  Kasies actions might disturb some readers because you are told from the beginning that she has a boyfriend but I felt the author did a good job of explaining Kasies thought process.  Copy provided in advance of release date courtesy of Net Galley.
